Rulings.Base:
1. You cannot activate this card during the Damage Step.
2. You cannot activate this card if there are no face-down Defense Position monsters on the field.
3. Changing monsters to Defense Position, drawing cards, and Special Summoning do not start a Chain.
4. You draw 1 card for each monster that is actually changed to face-down Defense Position.
5. If you do not Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher LIGHT Reptile-Type monster from your Deck, "Drastic Drop Off" can be activated after you draw the cards from this effect.
6. If you cannot change your LIGHT Reptile-Type monsters to face-down Defense Position due to "Dark Simorgh", you cannot draw cards or Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher LIGHT Reptile-Type monster.
7. None of these effects occur simultaneously.
8. [FORUM] You can activate "Royal Oppression" or "Solemn Warning" to negate "W Nebula Meteorite".
